title: varam onru kOrippera
sahitya:
varam onru kOrippera varuginrEn ayyA vaDa pazhani kudi koNDa vaDivEl murugaiyA


anupallavi

  sharaNam enak-kUri un sannidhi sEruvOrai aravaNaittu aruLum aNNalE unniDam


caraNam    dharaNi tanil undan tiruvaDi tuNaiyE tAn parama sukha bhOgamadai tarum enat-terindu
oru siridumE adanai maravAmal irundE karuttODu tudittu varuttamurAdu vAzhum
